channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 20th August
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level different please remove x1 raised 750x600x20mm slab replace with tarmac patch due to tree roots damage stats required number4 (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
